mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM cmember m JOIN creserve r ON r.mem_num = m.mem_num JOIN croom c ON r.room_num=c.room_num JOIN camping p ON c.camping_num=p.camping_num WHERE m.email=#{email} AND NOT r.res_state ='예약취소'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*,rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM cmember m JOIN creserve r ON r.mem_num = m.mem_num JOIN croom c ON r.room_num=c.room_num JOIN camping p ON c.camping_num=p.camping_num WHERE m.email=#{email} AND NOT r.res_state ='예약취소' ORDER BY r.res_num DESC )a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}

SELECT res_num, res_name,res_phone,headcount,res_start,res_end,res_state,mem_num,r.room_num,r.camping_num,res_email,camp_name,room_name,res_price FROM creserve r JOIN croom m ON r.room_num=m.room_num JOIN camping c ON c.camping_num=m.camping_num WHERE res_num=#{res_num}

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT a.*,rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM creserve r JOIN croom m ON r.room_num=m.room_num JOIN camping c ON c.camping_num=m.camping_num WHERE r.mem_num=#{mem_num} ORDER BY TO_dATE(RES_START) ASC)a)b WHERE rnum=(SELECT max(rnum) FROM (SELECT a.*,rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM creserve r JOIN croom m ON r.room_num=m.room_num JOIN camping c ON c.camping_num=m.camping_num WHERE r.mem_num=#{mem_num} ORDER BY TO_dATE(RES_START) ASC)a))
SELECT * FROM creserve_notification WHERE mem_num=#{mem_num} ORDER BY date_time
